column7: Meet Erenduil on the northern shore of the island afterwards.
column9: Steal a Firing Pin from a Trebuchet (right-click)

column4: Stop the Albion Invaders to the West of Fintain from setting up their trebuchets.\n\nMeet Erenduil on the northern shore of the island afterwards.
I watched your work, <Class>. well done.\n\nHowever, this invasion cannot be quelled until we dispatch the commanders who are responsible for coordinating the attack.

It is as I feared, <Class>. The invasion has started. Albion warships have come aground on the shores of Fintain and from my position, I can see that they are setting up their trebuchets. 4 terrible barrage of siege will be upon us if we do not thwart this incursion.

Thave dispatched a Master Ranger to approach the invasion force using his powers of stealth. He is concealing himself along the northwestern shore of the peninsula at a location which Thave marked on your map. on your way to him, slay as many invaders as you can. Be forewarned, these enemies are no foolish monsters. They will attack you if you are seen, even at some distance, so be very careful as you approach them.

We must thin their numbers, and most importantly, disable their siege weapons.Do what you can on your way to Erenduil.

May The Morrigan guide your hand in battle, <Class>.
